title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5015.2 - Members of retirement board who have been elected by the membership of the system
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5015.2 - Members of retirement board who have been elected by the membership of the system

State Regulations

It shall be the duty of each board of education which has
granted a leave of absence, pursuant to subdivision 6 of section
506
of the

Education Law, to a member of the system who has been elected by the membership
to the retirement board to annually report to the system the salary which said
board member would have earned for the said year had she/he not been on leave
of absence. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5015.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
